title: 'The Last Man': An Odd Premise, Says Its Creator, But Oddly Relatable
teaser: A new comedy series, The Last Man on Earth, features your average guy who becomes humanity's last hope. NPR's Rachel Martin speaks with Will Forte, the creator, writer and star of the show.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
